Code.Name: Credit note related to goods or services
Code.Description: Document message used to provide credit information related to a transaction for goods or services to the relevant party.

Code.Name: Credit note related to financial adjustments
Code.Description: Document message for providing credit information related to financial adjustments to the relevant party, e.g., bonuses.

Code.Name: Credit note
Code.Description: (1113) Document/message for providing credit information to the relevant party.

Code.Name: Factored credit note
Code.Description: Credit note related to assigned invoice(s).

Code.Name: Forwarder's credit note
Code.Description: Document/message for providing credit information to the relevant party.
